events.message: I have just filed a claim for a car accident that occurred yesterday involving my sedan and another vehicle at the intersection.
Your claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing your initial report and accident details.
An agent has been assigned to your claim and will contact you soon to discuss the next steps in processing your vehicle accident.
We have acknowledged receipt of your claim and appreciate your prompt reporting of the car collision incident.
Please submit a copy of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your vehicle registration documents to proceed.
I have submitted all requested documents including police reports and photos of the accidentâ€™s damage for your review.
The investigation team has started assessing the details surrounding the car collision and collecting necessary evidence.
The investigation into the auto accident has been completed; liability and damage extent have been carefully evaluated.
A settlement has been proposed for the damages to your vehicle based on the investigation findings and repair estimates.
I am satisfied with the proposed settlement offer and appreciate the clear communication throughout the process.
Your claim has been officially approved, and we are moving forward with the payment release for your vehicle repairs.
The payment for your auto accident claim has been successfully issued to your bank account as agreed.
Your auto accident claim case has now been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
For record-keeping purposes, your claim file related to the recent car collision has been archived in our system.
